backend/main.mo: Stores inquiries in a list, supports submitting, listing (sorted by timestamp), and deleting inquiries by timestamp.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence for replacing the founder photo, including affected files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries of key frontend files such as styles, components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Configures global Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell with a root div and script loading the React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout, home and admin routes, and renders header, footer, and toast system.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a validated contact form with async inquiry submission, error handling, and success messaging.
frontend/src/components/FaqAccordion.tsx: Displays a list of frequently asked questions using an accordion UI component.
Renders three founder profiles with circular images, names, and roles in a card grid.
frontend/src/components/PricingCards.tsx: Shows two pricing plans with features and a CTA button that scrolls to the contact section.
Renders a programs section with three level cards and a shared features card using Tailwind and UI components.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays the site footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with logo, navigation buttons, smooth scroll, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting inquiries through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables for light and dark themes with custom brand colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin page that fetches and displays contact inquiries with loading, error, and empty states in a table format.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero, features, programs, pricing, FAQ, and contact sections, including smooth-scroll actions and promotional content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage for styling the site.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, image tasks, and current build state for the English Discovery 2.0 website.
